createdAt.description: A timestamp acc. to RFC 3339 specifying when this entity was created.

createdBy.description: The username of the user who created this object.

customAspects.title: CustomAspect
customAspects.description: A custom property which is determined by the requested entity schema - see '/schemas'

displayName.description: A friendly human readable title of the referenced domain.

targetUri.description: The resource URL of the referenced domains.

id.description: ID must be a valid UUID string following RFC 4122.

links.title: CustomLink
links.description: Custom relations which do not affect the behavior.

displayName.description: A friendly human readable title of the referenced unit.

targetUri.description: The resource URL of the referenced unit.

owner.description: A reference to the unit containing this entity.

displayName.description: A friendly human readable title of the referenced entity.

targetUri.description: The resource URL of the referenced entity.

items.description: A reference to an entity's part

subType.title: SubType
subType.description: The sub type this entity has in each domain. Domain ID is key, sub type is value.

updatedAt.description: A timestamp acc. to RFC 3339 specifying when this entity was created.

updatedBy.description: The username of the user who last updated this object.
